verbose_text: These syndromes are similar because they share the Ras / mitogen activated protein kinase (RAS / MAPK) pathway.11 cardiofaciocutaneous syndrome (CFC) is a genetic disorder with autosomal dominant transmission caused by mutations in genes BRAF,12 MEK1,13 MEK2,14 or rarely KRAS.15 In most patients with CFC, ventriculomegaly / hydrocephalus and epilepsy are present.
evidence: caused by mutations in genes BRAF,12 MEK1
